com.samskivert.swing.RadialMenuItem

    Package Description
    com.samskivert.swing
    Provides extensions and patterns for building user interfaces with Swing.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void RadialMenu.addMenuItem(RadialMenuItem item)
      Adds an already constructed menu item to the menu.

      Adds an already constructed menu item to the menu.
      Icon RadialMenu.IconPredicate.getIcon(RadialMenu menu, RadialMenuItem item)
      Return an additional predicate that should be drawn.
      boolean RadialMenu.Predicate.isEnabled(RadialMenu menu, RadialMenuItem item)
      If true, the menu will be enabled when displayed in a character's menu.
      boolean RadialMenu.Predicate.isIncluded(RadialMenu menu, RadialMenuItem item)
      If true, the menu will be included in the character menu when it is displayed.
      void RadialMenu.removeMenuItem(RadialMenuItem item)
      Removes the specified menu item from this menu.
